name: Dreamwalker Girdle
tooltip:
Dreamwalker GirdleLevel 60

Rayne at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Dreamwalker Girdle if you bring her the following: 1 Desecrated Girdle, 8 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 3 Mooncloth and 2 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Girdle
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 8
- Mooncloth x 3
- Cured Rugged Hide x 2
